segments.text: Hello there , Sir . I've dealt with you before , haven't I ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You remember me ! Yes , I'm with Li Wang Enterprises ; I'm the Accountant Peters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course , Mr Peters ! Good to see you again . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we've just acquired a new business so we need to set up a lot of services with you . We are particularly interested in Agent Services .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We offer Agent Services free of charge here . Before your new business begins trading , we could , on behalf of your existing company , do a series of registration and get the certificates you need . If you are unsure of the local laws , that is .
segments.speaker: S1
